Dr Kirsty McGhee

Technical and scientific writer specialising in quantum computing software, with a PhD in materials science and photonics.

View the Project on GitHub kirstymcg/kirstymcg.github.io

Marketing & communications

Since the beginning of 2024, I have been the sole marketing and communications writer at Qruise, a company developing software to accelerate scientific research, with a strong focus on quantum computing.

News & press releases

I write all news articles and press releases for Qruise, which can be found here, as well as the newsletter. A selection is shown below:

  • Qruise expands into magnetic resonance with new simulation and control software, Resonance
    Read online · PDF

  • Qruise to help build open architecture quantum testbed with £1.65M Innovate UK grant
    Read online · PDF

Website content & design

I spearheaded a redesign of the company website, leading the content restructure and working closely with designers and developers to improve clarity and usability. This included redesigning the landing page, industry pages, product pages, and site navigation. You can check out the website here and select examples are shown below:

Blog posts

In 2026, I initiated a technical blog series exploring key challenges in quantum computing and how researchers are tackling them. I developed the concept, authored the posts, and coordinated the accompanying graphics. The first post in the series was published in January 2026.

  • Distorted Reality: How pulse distortions undermine quantum control and how to correct for them
    Read online · PDF

Prior to this series, I wrote a standalone technical blog post on quantum noise spectroscopy:

  • Quantum Noise Spectroscopy
    Read online · PDF

Social media

I manage the company LinkedIn, X, and Bluesky pages, writing posts, coordinating accompanying graphics, and engaging with other users and pages. Since starting at Qruise in 2024, our LinkedIn followers have tripled.
